languages.text: The wielder of this staff gains the Consign {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. This ability is also available in its {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} versions. The wielder's divination {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} that affect one ally also affect the ally closest to the target. Divination psychic powers, including Consign, that affect one enemy also affect the enemy closest to the target. +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}
languages.original_text: Обладатель посоха получает {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} Произвол судьбы. Также варианты этой способности доступны в качестве {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героического акта{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}отчаянных мер{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}Психосилы{/g} прорицания, действующие на одного союзника, также действуют на ближайшую к нему союзную цель. Психосилы прорицания, включая Произвол судьбы, действующие на одного противника, также действуют на ближайшего к нему противника. +20 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятию{/g}

traits.locale_text: The wielder of this staff gains the Consign {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. This ability is also available in its {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} versions. The wielder's divination {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}psychic powers{/g} that affect one ally also affect the ally closest to the target. Divination psychic powers, including Consign, that affect one enemy also affect the enemy closest to the target. +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

Психосилы прорицания, включая Произвол судьбы, действующие на одного противника, также действуют на ближайшего к нему противника. +20 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятию{/g}

languages.text: 这根法杖的使用者获得致命印记{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}。这个能力既可以作为{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}使用，也可以作为{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}背水一战{/g}使用。装备者的占卜类{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能力量{/g}对单个盟友释放时，也同样会影响离目标最近的一名盟友。所有占卜灵能力量，包括致命印记在内，对单个敌人释放时，也同样会影响离目标最近的一名敌人。 +20{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g} +10{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}
languages.original_text: The wielder of this staff gains the Consign {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. This ability is also available in its {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} versions. The wielder's divination {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} that affect one ally also affect the ally closest to the target. Divination psychic powers, including Consign, that affect one enemy also affect the enemy closest to the target. +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

traits.locale_text: 这根法杖的使用者获得致命印记{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}。这个能力既可以作为{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}使用，也可以作为{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}背水一战{/g}使用。装备者的占卜类{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}灵能力量{/g}对单个盟友释放时，也同样会影响离目标最近的一名盟友。所有占卜灵能力量，包括致命印记在内，对单个敌人释放时，也同样会影响离目标最近的一名敌人。 +20{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g} +10{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}

languages.text: 痛撃{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を獲得。同アビリティは{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}中および{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}非常手段{/g}でも使用可能。味方1体に影響を及ぼす使い手のディビネーションの{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}超能力{/g}は、ターゲットに最も近接する味方1体にも影響を及ぼす。敵1体に影響を及ぼすディビネーションの超能力には痛撃が含まれ、ターゲットに最も近接する敵1体にも影響を及ぼす。 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}+20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}認知力{/g}+10
languages.original_text: The wielder of this staff gains the Consign {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. This ability is also available in its {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} versions. The wielder's divination {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} that affect one ally also affect the ally closest to the target. Divination psychic powers, including Consign, that affect one enemy also affect the enemy closest to the target. +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

traits.locale_text: 痛撃{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を獲得。同アビリティは{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}中および{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}非常手段{/g}でも使用可能。味方1体に影響を及ぼす使い手のディビネーションの{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}超能力{/g}は、ターゲットに最も近接する味方1体にも影響を及ぼす。敵1体に影響を及ぼすディビネーションの超能力には痛撃が含まれ、ターゲットに最も近接する敵1体にも影響を及ぼす。 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}+20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}認知力{/g}+10

languages.text: El personaje que utilice este báculo obtiene la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} Sepultar. Esta capacidad también está disponible como {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}medida desesperada{/g}. Los {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poderes psíquicos{/g} de adivinación del personaje que afecten a un aliado también afectarán al aliado más cercano al objetivo. Los poderes psíquicos de adivinación, incluyendo Sepultar, que afectan a un enemigo también afectan al enemigo más cercano al objetivo. +20 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g}
languages.original_text: The wielder of this staff gains the Consign {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. This ability is also available in its {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} versions. The wielder's divination {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} that affect one ally also affect the ally closest to the target. Divination psychic powers, including Consign, that affect one enemy also affect the enemy closest to the target. +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

traits.locale_text: El personaje que utilice este báculo obtiene la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} Sepultar. Esta capacidad también está disponible como {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}medida desesperada{/g}. Los {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}poderes psíquicos{/g} de adivinación del personaje que afecten a un aliado también afectarán al aliado más cercano al objetivo. Los poderes psíquicos de adivinación, incluyendo Sepultar, que afectan a un enemigo también afectan al enemigo más cercano al objetivo. +20 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g}

languages.text: Der Träger dieses Stabes erlangt die {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} Anvertrauen. Diese Fähigkeit ist auch in den Versionen {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Verzweiflungstat{/g} verfügbar. Die {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionischen Kräfte{/g} des Trägers der Prophezeiung-Kategorie, die einen Verbündeten beeinflussen, haben auch Effekte auf den Verbündeten, der dem Ziel am nächsten ist. Psionische Kräfte der Prophezeiung-Kategorie, einschließlich Anvertrauen, die einen einzelnen Verbündeten beeinflussen, haben auch Effekte auf den Verbündeten, der dem Ziel am nächsten ist. +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g}
languages.original_text: The wielder of this staff gains the Consign {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. This ability is also available in its {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} versions. The wielder's divination {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} that affect one ally also affect the ally closest to the target. Divination psychic powers, including Consign, that affect one enemy also affect the enemy closest to the target. +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

traits.locale_text: Der Führer dieses Stabes erlangt die {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} Anvertrauen . Diese Fähigkeit ist auch in den Versionen {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Verzweiflungstat{/g} verfügbar. Die {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}psionischen Kräfte{/g} des Führers der Prophezeiung-Kategorie, die einen Verbündeten beeinflussen, haben auch Effekt auf den Verbündeten, der dem Ziel am nächsten ist. Psionische Kräfte der Prophezeiung-Kategorie, einschließlich Anvertrauen, die einen einzelnen Verbündeten beeinflussen, haben auch Effekt auf den Verbündeten, der dem Ziel am nächsten ist. +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g}

languages.text: L'utilisateur de ce bâton bénéficie de la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} Expédition. Les versions {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Acte héroïque{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Mesure désespérée{/g} de cette capacité sont également disponibles. Les {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoirs psychiques{/g} de divination de l'utilisateur qui affectent un allié affectent également l'allié le plus proche de la cible. Les pouvoirs psychiques de divination (capacité Expédition comprise) qui affectent un ennemi affectent également l'ennemi le plus proche de la cible. +20 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

languages.text: Bu asayı kullanan kişi, Damga {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetini{/g} kazanır. Bu kabiliyetin ayrıca {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}kahramanca eylem{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}son çare önlem{/g} hâlleri de mevcuttur. Kullanan kişinin bir dost birimi etkileyen kehanet {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}ruhsezi güçleri{/g}, hedefin en yakınındaki başka bir dost birime de etki eder. Damga da dâhil olmak üzere bir düşmanı etkileyen kehanet ruhsezi güçleri, hedefin en yakınındaki başka bir düşmana da etki eder. +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Algı{/g}
